Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 20 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 16 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 20ft, Average Damage: 18 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon can use its Frightful Presence.  It then makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Frightful Presence, Each creature that is aware of the Dragon must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the Dragon
Other Actions.Action 3: Lightning Breath, The Dragon exhales lightning in a line.  Each creature caught in the line takes an Average 88 Lightning damage
Other Actions.Action 4: Repulsion Breath, The Dragon exhales repulsion energy in a cone.  Each creature caught in the area makes a Strength saving throw or is pushed away from the Dragon
Other Actions.Action 5: Change Shape, The Dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Dragon can breathe air and water
Abilities.Ability 2: Legendary Resistance, If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Detect, The Dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Tail Attack, The Dragon makes a Tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Wing Attack, The Dragon beats its wings.  Nearby creatures make a Dexterity saving throw, failing they take an Average 16 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.  The Dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed

Lair Actions.Action 1: The Dragon creates a cloud of fog, obscuring the area
Lair Actions.Action 2: A thunderclap originates at a point the Dragon can see.  Creatures near the center of the point make a Constitution saving throw, taking an Average 5 Thunder damage and is deafened until the end of its enxt turn
